dict.acceptation: 描写，形容；叙述；描绘，作图；（行星等）周转；

sent.orig: Make students describe what Tom was doing at a certain time. If he can describe markgroup.
sent.trans: 以竞赛的形式用过去进行时描述汤姆在不同时间所做的事。

sent.orig: Dog expressions are also are used to describe describe the weather.
sent.trans: 狗的表达也经常用来描述天气。

sent.orig: Present dessert menu and describe items to each table, describe selections and make suggestions.
sent.trans: 为每台客人呈上甜品菜单并做简单介绍。

sent.orig: So this week, we describe describe a natural way to dye wool.
sent.trans: 本周，我们描述一种染羊毛的天然方法。

sent.orig: Circle the five words that best describe your family, and underline those that least describe it.
sent.trans: 圈选出最能够描述你的家庭气氛的五个形容词，而在最不适合的五个形容词底下划线。
